title: Academic survey on player self-presentation (~15 min.) + Lottery (win up to 50â‚¬ worth of RP!)
body:
Hello dear summoners,

two friends of mine from the University of Siegen, Germany, are conducting a survey in order to investigate the way players present themselves in LoL.

By participating in the study, you support their research and take part in a lottery where you can win 1 out of 5 RP vouchers. The survey will take around 15 minutes.

Survey link: https://tinyurl.com/ya4cpc4c

Thank you very much for your participation! Good luck on the fields of justice!

PS: Please feel free to share the survey! Thank you in advance! 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Finished, the lottery better not be a scam. I wanna hear who the winner is.
